data.text: Write a Python script that prints the names of the Hogwarts houses. Include comments explaining each part of your code.
The following code is intended to print the first book of the Harry Potter series, but it contains incorrect and missing comments. Correct and complete the comments.

book_title = "Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone"

# Print the book title
print(book_title)

data.text: Create a Python script that simulates a sorting hat decision. The script should randomly assign a student to one of the Hogwarts houses. Use block comments to describe the function's purpose and inline comments for any complex code parts.
